title: Airpod
description: AirPods are wireless Bluetooth earbuds designed by Apple. They were first released on September 7, 2016, with a second generation released in March 2019.

title: Airtag
description: AirTag is a tracking device developed by Apple. AirTag is designed to act as a key finder, helping people find personal objects.

title: Homekit
description: HomeKit is a software framework by Apple, made available in iOS/iPadOS that lets users configure, communicate with, and control smart-home appliances using Apple devices.

title: iPhone
description: The iPhone is a smartphone made by Apple that combines a computer, iPod, digital camera and cellular phone into one device with a touchscreen interface.

title: iWatch
description: Apple Watch is the ultimate device for a healthy life. Available in three models: Apple Watch Series 6, Apple Watch SE, and Apple Watch Series 3.

title: Macbook
description: The MacBook Pro is a line of Macintosh notebook computers introduced in January 2006 by Apple Inc.
